mapper.select: select ast.id as id,ast.t_name as tName , ast.t_money as tMoney,ast.integral_value as integralValue,ast.t_use_money as tUseMoney, atl.ticket_id as ticketId, atl.quantity as quantity, atl.use_phone as usePhone , atl.shop_id as shopId, atl.account_token as accountToken from account_saver_ticket ast JOIN account_ticket_list atl on ast.id=atl.ticket_id where atl.shop_id=#{1} and atl.account_token=#{0}
